column5: Hey all I just wanted to post that the West bound exit for Belle River road is now closed and will be most of the summer due to construction on the 401 you would be best to get off in Tilbury at exit 56 and head west there is also a good gas station there the Pilot truck stop I have not had any problems with the gas there They also have Sub Way in case you forgot a snack for on the water. Head west until you hit Belle River Rd. and turn right this will get you right into Belle River. Hope this helps some one out if you know of someone coming down this way please let them know.
Will the shameful plugging of businesses and services NEVER end around here? Kidding, kidding!  What a great tip, MrEh!    Thanks for the heads-up
And WHY would anyone head there? LOL Nice heads up Mr. Eh.
That's the short cut to Colchester for those delicious walleye. Thanks Mike, see ya out there! -Brian
a good tip to the muskie capital of north america. belle river ontario.. dont forget sunblock
Mike if we go the way you described can we turn left and cross the 401 on the Belle river road to head to Colchester or do we need to get South of the 401 at Tilbury.

Yes you can still cross under the 401 that is not shut down from what we saw but I think it might be later when they start to rip out the over pass mid june. Will try and remember to update this for people heading this way
Thanks again for the info Mike.
Thanks for the heads up Mike.  2 weeks to go.
